mapper.select: select member_no as memberNo, member_email as memberEmail, member_pw as memberPw, member_name as memberName, member_hbd as memberHbd, member_nickname as memberNickname, member_phone as memberPhone, member_img as memberImg, member_bank as memberBank, member_account as memberAccount, member_time as memberTime, member_level as memberLevel, member_status as memberStatus, member_intro as memberIntro, member_field as memberField, member_skill as memberSkill, member_school as memberSchool, member_major as memberMajor, member_grade as memberGrade, member_date as memberDate, report_no as reportNo, report_member_nickname as reportMemberNickname, report_board_type as reportBoardType, report_board_no as reportBoardNo from member JOIN report ON (member_nickname = report_member_nickname)

select member_no as memberNo, member_email as memberEmail, member_pw as memberPw, member_name as memberName, member_hbd as memberHbd, member_nickname as memberNickname, member_phone as memberPhone, member_img as memberImg, member_bank as memberBank, member_account as memberAccount, member_time as memberTime, member_level as memberLevel, member_status as memberStatus, member_intro as memberIntro, member_field as memberField, member_skill as memberSkill, member_school as memberSchool, member_major as memberMajor, member_grade as memberGrade, member_date as memberDate, report_no as reportNo, report_member_nickname as reportMemberNickname, report_board_type as reportBoardType, report_board_no as reportBoardNo from member JOIN report ON (member_nickname = report_member_nickname)

select member_no as memberNo, member_email as memberEmail, member_pw as memberPw, member_name as memberName, member_hbd as memberHbd, member_nickname as memberNickname, member_phone as memberPhone, member_img as memberImg, member_bank as memberBank, member_account as memberAccount, member_time as memberTime, member_level as memberLevel, member_status as memberStatus, member_intro as memberIntro, member_field as memberField, member_skill as memberSkill, member_school as memberSchool, member_major as memberMajor, member_grade as memberGrade, member_date as memberDate, report_no as reportNo, report_member_nickname as reportMemberNickname, report_board_type as reportBoardType, report_board_no as reportBoardNo from member JOIN report ON (member_nickname = report_member_nickname)
